title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.21 - Devices to be approved
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.21 - Devices to be approved

State Regulations

All devices pertaining to racing which are used on race
tracks must be approved in writing by the commission before installation and
shall not be removed except with the written consent of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
